about_the_game:
2D Pixel MMORPG Game

Playable in English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, and French.

Multiplayer (Play solo, with friends, or against everyone). Open world with diverse biomes: forest, jungle, desert, snowy wasteland, and volcanic regions.

Plus, dozens of dungeons to explore and hidden secrets to uncover. Ranking PvP and Top Players. Clan system.

Features:

  • Open World PVE Quests and Special Dungeons: Embark on missions across the world and challenge unique dungeons.

  • Raid Bosses and Wanderers to Hunt: Scattered across the world for an epic challenge.

  • Progression from Tier 0 to Tier 10: Level up and unlock new tiers of power.

  • Skill Tree Development: Customize your character and make them truly unique.

  • Buffs and Equipment: Forge your battle strategy with a variety of buffs and gear options.

  • Defeat Mighty Dungeon Bosses for the Best Gear: Face legendary enemies and earn top-tier rewards.

Storyline:

Embark on a grand narrative adventure to discover who you were before rising as a skeleton and find a way to break your curse. Time is running out, as you risk losing your sanity and becoming part of the enslaved warrior army of the great necromancer, Ferral.

Highlights:

  • Simple and Intuitive Controls: With an accessible information panel that explains gameplay mechanics in detail.

  • Achievement Panels: Hunt down all the bosses in the game and complete your achievement panel 100%. You can also complete the mythical items panel. Ferral Quest won’t make it easy for you.

  • Collaboration with Streamers and Content Creators: Each streamer has chosen a Raid Boss as their champion representative. Hunt them all!

  • Side Quests Across the Open World: Help a merchant find lost items, mine resources while waves of subterranean creatures attack, or pray to the gods—they might bless you… or punish you by sending their troops to destroy you.

  • Progress Through the Main Storyline: Evolve your character from a skeleton into something no one can predict by the end of your adventure.

  • Wide Variety of Pets: Let adorable and powerful pets accompany you on your journey.

Guaranteed Fun

Additionally, by playing exclusively on Steam, you will receive +3 attribute points to add to your skills and start with an advantage.

Can you defeat the necromancer Ferral and find out who you were before you resurfaced as a skeleton with no memories?

short_description: Ferral Quest is a 2D pixel RPG featuring diverse biomes, challenging dungeons, and epic bosses. Play solo or with friends. Customize your character with a skill tree and progress from Tier 0 to Tier 10. Discover who you were before rising as a skeleton and face the great necromancer Ferral.
